name: Insectotron 3D
description: Insectotron 3D thrusts you into the World of Nidra, where a Swarm of Insects are decimating large parts of the human population. Your mission is to infiltrate five military installations that exist on Nidra, collect Artifact-Coins to complete a Ritual which will eradicate all of the Swarm and throw your NANO-Nets to capture Insects for analysis. Prepare for a fast-paced action experience in order to save those people, Commander!
